markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Lady's Chalice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1546)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 200</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This silver chalice bears the symbol of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), a swirling cloud that transforms into a flight of whippoorwills that encircle the top. The chalice can be activated in one of two ways, though only once per day total.

<document level="2" id="action-1166" />

<document level="2" id="action-1167" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lady's Chalice
